bind.value: _isEmptySlot ? ('empty_slot_' + _formationType) : isOtherDivision ? (isCommander ? 'player_ready_other_division_commander' : 'player_ready_other_division') : isInBattle && _isWardog ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isInBattle ? ('player_in_battle_' + _formationType) : _isWardog && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : _isWardog && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType + '_merc') : isCommander && isReady ? ('commander_' + _formationType) : isCommander && !isReady ? ('commander_not_ready_' +_formationType) : !isCommander && isReady ? ('player_ready_' + _formationType) : !isCommander && !isReady ? ('player_not_ready_' + _formationType) : 'empty_slot_division'

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'stats'; [ {label: 'IDS_CLUB_BATTLES_COUNT', rate: 'no_rate', count: battlesCount}, {label: 'IDS_VICTORIES' , rate: winRate, count: winCount}, {label: 'IDS_DRAWS' , rate: drawRate, count: drawCount}, {label: 'IDS_DEFEATS' , rate: loseRate, count: loseCount}]

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {scaleY: 0.5, scaleX: 0.5, ubScaleY: 0.5, ubScaleX: 0.5, alpha: 0, top: 10}; {scaleY: 1, scaleX: 1, ubScaleY: 1, ubScaleX: 1, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {width: 34, height: 34, alpha: 0, top: 20}; {width: 68, height: 68, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==0; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==0 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==1; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==1 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: fade
bind.value: change==2; 0.14; {left: 68, alpha: 0}; {left: 0, alpha: 1}; {left: -68, alpha: 0}; 0; firstChange ? 0 : change==2 ? 0.57 : 0.5

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.15; 0.3; {width: 34, height: 34, alpha: 0, top: 20}; {width: 68, height: 68, alpha: 1, top: 0}

bind.name: watch

bind.name: text
bind.value: tr('IDS_MAX_WAITING_IN_BATTLE_TYPE') + ' ' + tr( queueTypeIdent == 'RANK_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_IN_RANKED_BATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'CLUB_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_IN_CLUB_BATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'RANDOM' ? 'IDS_IN_RANDOM_BATTLE' : queueTypeIdent == 'PVE_BATTLE' ? 'IDS_IN_PVE_BATTLE' : 'IDS_IN_COOPERATIVE_BATTLE') + ' ' + toLowerCase(tr(balancer_stats.fullTeamOnly ? 'IDS_NOT_LIMITED' : 'IDS_NOT_MORE_THAN'))
